professional_summary: Experienced SQL Server Database Administrator with expertise in database design, performance optimization, disaster recovery, and data security. Proficient in managing backups and maintaining high-availability systems. Strong emphasis on regulatory compliance and detailed documentation.

key_responsibilities: Administered and maintained Microsoft SQL Server databases across multiple environments.
Designed and implemented complex database solutions to support business applications.
Optimized database performance through index management and query tuning.
Assisted in the development of database systems adhering to regulatory requirements.
Performed unit testing to ensure system stability and performance.
Supported production rotations by providing documentation and process knowledge.
Assisted in the setup and configuration of new database systems.
Learned and applied processes for maintaining and updating databases.
Provided support during production system upgrades and patches.
